byline.contributor: Ken Belson, Matt Flegenheimer, Emmarie Huetteman and Tas Tobey contributed reporting.
byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and RICHARD A. OPPEL Jr

abstract: Donald J Trump draws widespread condemnation for criticizing Khizr and Ghazala Khan, parents of slain Muslim soldier Humayan Khan who spoke out against Trump at Democratic National Convention; Trump suggests Khizr Khan delivered entire speech because his wife was not allowed to speak.

headline.print_headline: Ire for Trump as He Derides Muslim Parents
headline.main: Donald Trump Criticizes Muslim Family of Slain U.S. Soldier, Drawing Ire

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: In an ABC interview, Mr. Trump implied that Ghazala Khan’s silence while her husband spoke about their soldier son’s death at the Democratic convention may have been because of her Muslim faith....
lead_paragraph: In an ABC interview, Mr. Trump implied that Ghazala Khan’s silence while her husband spoke about their soldier son’s death at the Democratic convention may have been because of her Muslim faith.
